intro: Ruschia karroidea, commonly known as the Karroo Ruschia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. This succulent plant features small, fleshy leaves that are often covered in a powdery coating, which helps reduce water loss. It produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange, typically blooming in spring. Ruschia karroidea is well adapted to arid environments and is often found in rocky or sandy soils.
